item.title: How do i delete a=massing
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

under public int totalqp = 0;

Add this code

long lastProcess = System.currentTimeMillis();

Search using Ctrl & F for

public boolean process() {

Now right under that add this:

[code] long timeSpent = System.currentTimeMillis()-lastProcess; //stop rapid clicking to speed up timers
if(timeSpent >= server.cycleTime) {
timeSpent = server.cycleTime;
lastProcess = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

   if((System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTimerUpdate) > 500) {
	lastTimerUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis();
            Timerz();
   }[/code]

change 500 to what you want
